title: Stock Futures Fall as Inflation Weighs on Markets
sub_head: Cryptocurrencies were broadly down, with bitcoin hitting its lowest level since 2020
body:
U.S. stock futures declined, pointing to a second day of turbulence in markets driven by stronger-than-expected U.S. inflation.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 fell 0.7% after the broad-market index closed down 1.7% on Wednesday. Nasdaq-100 futures retreated 1%, suggesting more losses for technology stocks after the opening bell.  Contracts on the Dow Jones Industrial Average shed 0.6%.
